createDatabaseManager

public static ISysDatabaseManager createDatabaseManager(ISysConfigItem configItem)
                                                 throws CSysDBRException,
                                                        CSysConfigException
Load the database manager by name.

Parameters:
configItem - The configruation item from which the database manager is loaded.
Returns:
the new empty ISysDatabaseManager.
Throws:
CSysDBRException - if the creation fails
CSysConfigException - if the configuration is wrong
